price: Salvo hechos consumados, les está prohibido casarse con las exesposas de sus padres, porque es algo obsceno, aborrecible e inmoral.
arabic: وَلَا تَنكِحُواْ مَا نَكَحَ ءَابَآؤُكُم مِّنَ ٱلنِّسَآءِ إِلَّا مَا قَدۡ سَلَفَۚ إِنَّهُۥ كَانَ فَٰحِشَةٗ وَمَقۡتٗا وَسَآءَ سَبِيلًا

version.title: Spanish Translation - Isa Garcia
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Spanish by Muhammad Isa Garcia - Printed in 1433 H.

meta.transliteration: walā tankiḥū mā nakaḥa ābāukum mina al-nisāi illā mā qad salafa innahu kāna fāḥishatan wamaqtan wasāa sabīlan
